startScreen.title: AI-powered photo editing  <0>simplified</0>
startScreen.subtitle: Retouch photos, apply creative filters, or make professional adjustments using simple text prompts. No complex tools needed.

retouch.title: Precision Retouching
retouch.description: Click anywhere on the image to precisely remove blemishes, change colors, or add elements.

filters.title: Creative Filters
filters.description: Transform photos with artistic styles. From vintage looks to futuristic glows, find or create the perfect filter.

adjustments.title: Professional Adjustments
adjustments.description: Enhance lighting, blur backgrounds, or change the mood. Get studio-quality results without complex tools.

retouch.clickPrompt: Click on an area of the image for precise editing.
retouch.goodPrompt: Great! Now describe your local edit below.

placeholder.inactive: Please click a point on the image first
placeholder.active: e.g., 'change my shirt color to blue'

filters.title: Apply Filter
filters.customPlaceholder: or describe a custom filter (e.g., '80s synthwave glow')

adjustments.title: Apply Professional Adjustments
adjustments.customPlaceholder: or describe an adjustment (e.g., 'change background to forest')

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.instruction: Click and drag on the image to select crop area.

errors.title: Error Occurred
errors.noHotspot: Please click on the image to select an area to edit.
errors.noImageForFilter: No image loaded to apply filter.
errors.noImageForAdjustment: No image loaded to apply adjustment.
errors.noCropArea: Please select an area to crop.

draw.title: AI Drawing Studio
draw.subtitle: Harness the power of AI to create stunning images from text descriptions, reference images, or intelligent analysis

textToImage.title: Generate Image from Text
textToImage.placeholder: Describe the image you want to create (e.g., 'mountain landscape at sunset, oil painting style')

reference.title: Generate with Reference Images
reference.prompt: Describe your creation based on the reference images

errors.noReference: Please upload at least one reference image
errors.noImageToAnalyze: Please upload an image to analyze
